<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">
</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<h2 id="Training-and-Testing-Set">Training and Testing Set<a class="anchor-link" href="#Training-and-Testing-Set">¶</a></h2><ul>
<li>Construct training and testing sets:<ul>
<li>Random sample 75% of dataset to train the models</li>
<li>Remaining 25% of data is the testing set<ul>
<li>Data that our models never see or use</li>
<li>Used to determine the accuracy of our models</li>
</ul>
</li>
</ul>
</li>
</ul>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">In [102]:</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="input_area">
<div class=" highlight hl-ipython2"><pre><span></span><span class="n">X_train</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">X_test</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">Y_train</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">Y_test</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">train_test_split</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">df1</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">drop</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s1">'labels'</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="n">axis</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="mi">1</span><span class="p">),</span> <span class="n">df1</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">'labels'</span><span class="p">],</span> <span class="n">test_size</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="mf">0.25</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="n">xtest_copy</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">X_test</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">copy</span><span class="p">()</span>
<span class="n">ytest_copy</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">Y_test</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">copy</span><span class="p">()</span>
<span class="n">X_train</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">X_train</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">drop</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s1">'studentid'</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">axis</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="mi">1</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="n">X_test</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">X_test</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">drop</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s1">'studentid'</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">axis</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="mi">1</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="k">print</span> <span class="s1">'Size of test set:'</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">X_test</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">shape</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">]</span>
<span class="k">print</span> <span class="s1">'Percent of students who return in train set:'</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="nb">sum</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">Y_train</span><span class="p">)</span><span class="o">/</span><span class="nb">len</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">Y_train</span><span class="p">)</span> <span class="o">*</span> <span class="mi">100</span>
<span class="k">print</span> <span class="s1">'Percent of students who return in test set:'</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="nb">sum</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">Y_test</span><span class="p">)</span><span class="o">/</span><span class="nb">len</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">Y_test</span><span class="p">)</span> <span class="o">*</span> <span class="mi">100</span>
</pre></div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="output_wrapper">
<div class="output">
<div class="output_area"><div class="prompt"></div>
<div class="output_subarea output_stream output_stdout output_text">
<pre>Size of test set: 21213
Percent of students who return in train set: 54.5655965681
Percent of students who return in test set: 54.2261820582
</pre>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">
</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<h3 id="The-Ultimate-Crime">The Ultimate Crime<a class="anchor-link" href="#The-Ultimate-Crime">¶</a></h3><p>Classifying a student as returning, when the student will not return</p>
<ul>
<li>Consequence: Not intervening and offering the student the necessary resources possibly leading to the student not returning to school</li>
</ul>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">
</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<h2 id="Evaluation-Metric:-True-Negative-Rate-(tnr)">Evaluation Metric: True Negative Rate (tnr)<a class="anchor-link" href="#Evaluation-Metric:-True-Negative-Rate-(tnr)">¶</a></h2><ul>
<li>True Negative Rate = $\displaystyle \frac{t_n}{t_n + f_p}$<ul>
<li>$t_n$ = True Negatives (0 label/student does not return)</li>
<li>$f_p$ = False Positives (1 label/student returns)</li>
<li>Maximizing true negative rate:<ul>
<li>Better classifications of students not returning</li>
<li>Lower misclassifications of students not returning</li>
</ul>
</li>
</ul>
</li>
</ul>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">
</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<h2 id="Probation-Rule">Probation Rule<a class="anchor-link" href="#Probation-Rule">¶</a></h2><ul>
<li>To use as one of the baselines, we will consider making a prediction on the test set using the probabtion policy that institutions such as Long Beach City College use:<ul>
<li>Mark student as going to return (label = 1) if the student has a recent gpa of 2.0 or greater</li>
<li>Mark student as not going to return (label = 0) if the student has a recent gpa less than 2.0 or an overall gpa of less than 2.0</li>
</ul>
</li>
</ul>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">In [103]:</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="input_area">
<div class=" highlight hl-ipython2"><pre><span></span><span class="k">def</span> <span class="nf">plot_confusion</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">cm</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">classes</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">title</span><span class="p">):</span>
    <span class="n">fig</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">plt</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">figure</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">figsize</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="p">(</span><span class="mi">4</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="mi">4</span><span class="p">))</span>
    <span class="n">sns</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">heatmap</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">cm</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">annot</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="bp">True</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">fmt</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="s1">'d'</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">annot_kws</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="p">{</span><span class="s2">"size"</span><span class="p">:</span> <span class="mi">20</span><span class="p">},</span>
               <span class="n">xticklabels</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">'Not Returning'</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s1">'Returning'</span><span class="p">],</span> 
               <span class="n">yticklabels</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">'Not Returning'</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s1">'Returning'</span><span class="p">],</span>
               <span class="n">cbar</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">,</span> 
               <span class="n">cmap</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="s2">"Blues"</span><span class="p">)</span>
    <span class="n">plt</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">xticks</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">rotation</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">fontsize</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="mi">12</span><span class="p">)</span>
    <span class="n">plt</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">yticks</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">rotation</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="mi">90</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">fontsize</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="mi">12</span><span class="p">)</span>
    <span class="n">plt</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">xlabel</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s1">'Predicted Labels'</span><span class="p">)</span>
    <span class="n">plt</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">ylabel</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s1">'True Labels'</span><span class="p">)</span>
    <span class="n">plt</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">title</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">title</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">fontsize</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="mi">16</span><span class="p">)</span>
    <span class="n">plt</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">tight_layout</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">h_pad</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="mf">5.0</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">w_pad</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="mf">3.0</span><span class="p">)</span>
</pre></div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">In [137]:</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="input_area">
<div class=" highlight hl-ipython2"><pre><span></span><span class="n">gpa_df</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">X_test</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">copy</span><span class="p">()</span>
<span class="n">gpa_df</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">'human_labels'</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">np</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">ones</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="nb">len</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">gpa_df</span><span class="p">))</span>
<span class="c1"># 2 semester probation </span>
<span class="c1"># gpa_df.ix[((gpa_df.most_recent_gpa <= 2.0) | (gpa_df.overall_gpa <= 2.0)), 'human_labels'] = 0</span>

<span class="c1"># 1 semester probation</span>
<span class="n">gpa_df</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">ix</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="n">gpa_df</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">overall_gpa</span> <span class="o"><=</span> <span class="mf">2.0</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s1">'human_labels'</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="mi">0</span>
<span class="k">print</span> <span class="s1">'accuracy:'</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="nb">sum</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="nb">abs</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">np</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">array</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">gpa_df</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">'human_labels'</span><span class="p">])</span> <span class="o">-</span> <span class="n">np</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">array</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">Y_test</span><span class="p">)))</span><span class="o">/</span><span class="nb">float</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">X_test</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">shape</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">])</span> <span class="o">*</span> <span class="mi">100</span>
<span class="n">pred_labels_in</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">np</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">array</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">gpa_df</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">'human_labels'</span><span class="p">])</span>
<span class="n">classes</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">'Not Returning'</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s1">'Returning'</span><span class="p">]</span>
<span class="n">cm_in</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">confusion_matrix</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">Y_test</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">pred_labels_in</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="n">plot_confusion</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">cm_in</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">classes</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">title</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="s1">'Probation Confusion Matrix'</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="n">tnr_pj</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">cm_in</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">]</span><span class="o">/</span><span class="nb">float</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">cm_in</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">+</span> <span class="n">cm_in</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="mi">1</span><span class="p">])</span>
<span class="k">print</span> <span class="s1">'tnr'</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">tnr_pj</span> 
</pre></div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="output_wrapper">
<div class="output">
<div class="output_area"><div class="prompt"></div>
<div class="output_subarea output_stream output_stdout output_text">
<pre>accuracy: 41.8564088059
tnr 0.775489186406
</pre>
</div>
</div>

<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">
</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<p>The true negative rate of the probation model is not bad. However, the alarming metric for this model is the number of false positives. In terms of practicality, the probation model reaches out to 6699 students that are actually returning and puts them on probation. The probation process includes informing students that they are placed on probation. This can cause several issues including discouragement for the students.</p>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">
</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<h2 id="Machine-Learning-Models:">Machine Learning Models:<a class="anchor-link" href="#Machine-Learning-Models:">¶</a></h2><ul>
<li>Decision Tree</li>
<li>Lasso</li>
<li>Gradient Boosting</li>
<li>Two outputs of the Lasso and Gradient Boosting Models:<ul>
<li>Probability of student not returning</li>
<li>Probability of students returning</li>
</ul>
</li>
</ul>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">
</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<h2 id="Decision-Tree">Decision Tree<a class="anchor-link" href="#Decision-Tree">¶</a></h2>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">
</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<p>The first model we will deploy is the decision tree model.</p>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">In [105]:</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="input_area">
<div class=" highlight hl-ipython2"><pre><span></span><span class="n">dt_model</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">DecisionTreeClassifier</span><span class="p">()</span>
<span class="n">dt_model</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">fit</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">X_train</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">Y_train</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="k">print</span> <span class="s1">'accuracy:'</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">dt_model</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">score</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">X_test</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">Y_test</span><span class="p">)</span> <span class="o">*</span> <span class="mi">100</span>
</pre></div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="output_wrapper">
<div class="output">
<div class="output_area"><div class="prompt"></div>
<div class="output_subarea output_stream output_stdout output_text">
<pre>accuracy: 65.4598595201
</pre>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">In [132]:</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="input_area">
<div class=" highlight hl-ipython2"><pre><span></span><span class="n">prob_dt</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">dt_model</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">predict_proba</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">X_test</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="n">pred_labels_dt</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="p">[</span><span class="mi">0</span> <span class="k">if</span> <span class="n">prob_dt</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="n">i</span><span class="p">][</span><span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">>.</span><span class="mi">30</span> <span class="k">else</span> <span class="mi">1</span> <span class="k">for</span> <span class="n">i</span> <span class="ow">in</span> <span class="nb">range</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="nb">len</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">prob_dt</span><span class="p">))]</span> 
<span class="n">acc</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="mi">1</span> <span class="o">-</span> <span class="n">np</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">sum</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="nb">abs</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">Y_test</span> <span class="o">-</span> <span class="n">pred_labels_dt</span><span class="p">))</span><span class="o">/</span><span class="nb">len</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">Y_test</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="c1"># print 'accuracy:', acc</span>
<span class="n">classes</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">'Not Returning'</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s1">'Returning'</span><span class="p">]</span>
<span class="n">cm_dt</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">confusion_matrix</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">Y_test</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">pred_labels_dt</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="n">plot_confusion</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">cm_dt</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">classes</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">title</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="s1">'Decision Tree Confusion Matrix'</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="n">tnr_dt</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">cm_dt</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">]</span><span class="o">/</span><span class="nb">float</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">cm_dt</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">+</span> <span class="n">cm_dt</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="mi">1</span><span class="p">])</span>
<span class="k">print</span> <span class="s1">'tnr:'</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">tnr_dt</span> 
</pre></div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="output_wrapper">
<div class="output">
<div class="output_area"><div class="prompt"></div>
<div class="output_subarea output_stream output_stdout output_text">
<pre>tnr: 0.642327497425
</pre>
</div>
</div>

<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">
</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<h2 id="Lasso">Lasso<a class="anchor-link" href="#Lasso">¶</a></h2><ul>
<li>Logistic Regression with L-1 Penalty</li>
</ul>
\begin{equation*}
\displaystyle J(\theta) = \frac{-1}{m} \sum_{i = 1}^{n} [y_i log(h_{\theta} (x_i) + (1 - y_i) log(1 - h_{\theta}(x_i))] + \frac{C}{2m} ||\theta||_1
\end{equation*}\begin{equation*}
\displaystyle h_{\theta}(x) = \frac{1}{1 + e^{-\theta^Tx}}
\end{equation*}
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">In [127]:</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="input_area">
<div class=" highlight hl-ipython2"><pre><span></span><span class="n">lasso</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">LogisticRegression</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">penalty</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="s1">'l1'</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="n">lasso_param</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="p">{</span><span class="s1">'C'</span><span class="p">:</span> <span class="p">[</span><span class="mf">0.1</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="mf">0.5</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="mf">0.75</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="mf">1.</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="mf">1.5</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="mf">2.</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="mf">3.</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="mf">4.</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="mf">5.</span><span class="p">]}</span>
<span class="n">gs_lasso</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">GridSearchCV</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">lasso</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">lasso_param</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="n">gs_lasso</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">fit</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">X_train</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">Y_train</span><span class="p">)</span>

<span class="n">best_C</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">gs_lasso</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">best_params_</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">'C'</span><span class="p">]</span>
<span class="n">best_lasso</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">LogisticRegression</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">penalty</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="s1">'l1'</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">C</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">best_C</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="n">best_lasso</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">fit</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">X_train</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">Y_train</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="k">print</span> <span class="s1">'overall accuracy:'</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">best_lasso</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">score</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">X_test</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">Y_test</span><span class="p">)</span> <span class="o">*</span> <span class="mi">100</span>
</pre></div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="output_wrapper">
<div class="output">
<div class="output_area"><div class="prompt"></div>
<div class="output_subarea output_stream output_stdout output_text">
<pre>overall accuracy: 73.1768255315
</pre>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">
</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<p>The default threshold for classification is 50%. We can change this threshold to improve the true negative rate. I will use 30% as the new threshold for classifying a student as not returning (0 label). It seems practical for schools to want to intervene and provide resources to students who have a 30% probability opposed to a 50% probability due to the sensitivity of the situation of a student's sucess.</p>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">In [131]:</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="input_area">
<div class=" highlight hl-ipython2"><pre><span></span><span class="n">prob_lasso</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">best_lasso</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">predict_proba</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">X_test</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="n">pred_labels_lasso</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="p">[</span><span class="mi">0</span> <span class="k">if</span> <span class="n">prob_lasso</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="n">i</span><span class="p">][</span><span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">>.</span><span class="mi">30</span> <span class="k">else</span> <span class="mi">1</span> <span class="k">for</span> <span class="n">i</span> <span class="ow">in</span> <span class="nb">range</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="nb">len</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">prob_lasso</span><span class="p">))]</span> 
<span class="n">acc</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="mi">1</span> <span class="o">-</span> <span class="n">np</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">sum</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="nb">abs</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">Y_test</span> <span class="o">-</span> <span class="n">pred_labels_lasso</span><span class="p">))</span><span class="o">/</span><span class="nb">len</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">Y_test</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="c1"># print 'accuracy:', acc</span>
<span class="n">classes</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">'Not Returning'</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s1">'Returning'</span><span class="p">]</span>
<span class="n">cm_lasso</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">confusion_matrix</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">Y_test</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">pred_labels_lasso</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="n">plot_confusion</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">cm_lasso</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">classes</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">title</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="s1">'Lasso Confusion Matrix'</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="n">tnr_lasso</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">cm_lasso</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">]</span><span class="o">/</span><span class="nb">float</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">cm_lasso</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">+</span> <span class="n">cm_lasso</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="mi">1</span><span class="p">])</span>
<span class="k">print</span> <span class="s1">'tnr:'</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">tnr_lasso</span> 
</pre></div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="output_wrapper">
<div class="output">
<div class="output_area"><div class="prompt"></div>
<div class="output_subarea output_stream output_stdout output_text">
<pre>tnr: 0.862615859938
</pre>
</div>

<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">In [111]:</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="input_area">
<div class=" highlight hl-ipython2"><pre><span></span><span class="n">log_loss</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">Y_test</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">best_lasso</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">predict_proba</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">X_test</span><span class="p">))</span>
</pre></div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="output_wrapper">
<div class="output">
<div class="output_area"><div class="prompt output_prompt">Out[111]:</div>
<div class="output_text output_subarea output_execute_result">
<pre>0.53992857578113995</pre>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">
</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<h3 id="Gradient-Boosting">Gradient Boosting<a class="anchor-link" href="#Gradient-Boosting">¶</a></h3><ul>
<li>Combine many weak learning models, in this case, decision trees such as the decision tree model we deployed earlier to build a stronger model</li>
</ul>
\begin{equation*}
\displaystyle F_m(x) = F_{m-1}(x) + \sum_{j = 1}^{J} \gamma_{jm}h_m(x)I(x \in R_{jm})
\end{equation*}\begin{equation*}
\displaystyle \gamma_{jm} = \arg\min_{\gamma} \sum_{x_i \in R_{jm}} L(y_i, F_{m-1}(x_i) + \gamma h_m(x_i))
\end{equation*}
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">In [126]:</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="input_area">
<div class=" highlight hl-ipython2"><pre><span></span><span class="n">gb_model</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">GradientBoostingClassifier</span><span class="p">()</span>
<span class="n">params</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="p">{</span><span class="s1">'n_estimators'</span><span class="p">:</span> <span class="p">[</span><span class="mi">250</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="mi">300</span><span class="p">],</span> <span class="s1">'max_depth'</span><span class="p">:</span> <span class="p">[</span><span class="mi">5</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="mi">7</span><span class="p">],</span><span class="s1">'max_features'</span><span class="p">:[</span><span class="s1">'sqrt'</span><span class="p">],</span> 
          <span class="s1">'min_samples_split'</span><span class="p">:[</span><span class="mi">2</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="mi">5</span><span class="p">],</span><span class="s1">'subsample'</span><span class="p">:</span> <span class="p">[</span><span class="mf">0.8</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="mf">1.0</span><span class="p">]}</span>
<span class="n">gb_gs</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">GridSearchCV</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">gb_model</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">params</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="n">gb_gs</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">fit</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">X_train</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">Y_train</span><span class="p">)</span>

<span class="n">gb_gs</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">best_params_</span>

<span class="n">n</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">gb_gs</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">best_params_</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">'n_estimators'</span><span class="p">]</span>
<span class="n">depth</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">gb_gs</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">best_params_</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">'max_depth'</span><span class="p">]</span>
<span class="n">features</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">gb_gs</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">best_params_</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">'max_features'</span><span class="p">]</span>
<span class="n">min_samples</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">gb_gs</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">best_params_</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">'min_samples_split'</span><span class="p">]</span>
<span class="n">sub_sample</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">gb_gs</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">best_params_</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">'subsample'</span><span class="p">]</span>


<span class="n">gb_model</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">GradientBoostingClassifier</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">n_estimators</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">n</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">max_features</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">features</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">max_depth</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">depth</span><span class="p">,</span>
                                     <span class="n">min_samples_split</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">min_samples</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">subsample</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">sub_sample</span><span class="p">)</span>

<span class="n">gb_model</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">fit</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">X_train</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">Y_train</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="k">print</span> <span class="s1">'overall accourcay:'</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">gb_model</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">score</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">X_test</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">Y_test</span><span class="p">)</span> <span class="o">*</span> <span class="mi">100</span>
</pre></div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="output_wrapper">
<div class="output">
<div class="output_area"><div class="prompt"></div>
<div class="output_subarea output_stream output_stdout output_text">
<pre>overall accourcay: 74.9398953472
</pre>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">In [130]:</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="input_area">
<div class=" highlight hl-ipython2"><pre><span></span><span class="n">prob_gb</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">gb_model</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">predict_proba</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">X_test</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="n">pred_labels_gb</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="p">[</span><span class="mi">0</span> <span class="k">if</span> <span class="n">prob_gb</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="n">i</span><span class="p">][</span><span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">>.</span><span class="mi">30</span> <span class="k">else</span> <span class="mi">1</span> <span class="k">for</span> <span class="n">i</span> <span class="ow">in</span> <span class="nb">range</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="nb">len</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">prob_gb</span><span class="p">))]</span> 
<span class="n">acc</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="mi">1</span> <span class="o">-</span> <span class="n">np</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">sum</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="nb">abs</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">Y_test</span> <span class="o">-</span> <span class="n">pred_labels_gb</span><span class="p">))</span><span class="o">/</span><span class="nb">len</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">Y_test</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="c1"># print 'accuracy with threshold:', acc</span>
<span class="n">classes</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">'Not Returning'</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s1">'Returning'</span><span class="p">]</span>
<span class="n">cm_gb</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">confusion_matrix</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">Y_test</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">pred_labels_gb</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="n">plot_confusion</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">cm_gb</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">classes</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">title</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="s1">'Gradient Boosting Confusion Matrix'</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="n">tnr_gb</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">cm_gb</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">]</span><span class="o">/</span><span class="nb">float</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">cm_gb</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">+</span> <span class="n">cm_gb</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="mi">1</span><span class="p">])</span>
<span class="k">print</span> <span class="s1">'tnr:'</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">tnr_gb</span>
</pre></div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="output_wrapper">
<div class="output">
<div class="output_area"><div class="prompt"></div>
<div class="output_subarea output_stream output_stdout output_text">
<pre>tnr: 0.86982492276
</pre>
</div>
</div>

</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<h3 id="Feature-Importance-(Gradient-Boosting)">Feature Importance (Gradient Boosting)<a class="anchor-link" href="#Feature-Importance-(Gradient-Boosting)">¶</a></h3>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">In [114]:</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="input_area">
<div class=" highlight hl-ipython2"><pre><span></span><span class="n">index</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">np</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">argsort</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">gb_model</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">feature_importances_</span><span class="p">)[</span><span class="o">-</span><span class="mi">7</span><span class="p">:]</span>
<span class="n">feat_values</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">np</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">sort</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">gb_model</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">feature_importances_</span><span class="p">)</span><span class="o">/</span><span class="n">np</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">max</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">gb_model</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">feature_importances_</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="n">best_feat_values</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">feat_values</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="o">-</span><span class="mi">7</span><span class="p">:]</span>
<span class="nb">list</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">df1</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">drop</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s1">'labels'</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">axis</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="mi">1</span><span class="p">)</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">columns</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="n">index</span><span class="p">])</span>
</pre></div>
</div>
</div>
</div>

<span class="n">sns</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">barplot</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">df1</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">drop</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s1">'labels'</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">axis</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="mi">1</span><span class="p">)</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">columns</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="n">index</span><span class="p">],</span> <span class="n">best_feat_values</span> <span class="p">)</span>
</pre></div>

<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">
</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<p>The second most important feature is the number of transferable courses the student has taken during their 1st semester. This is also not surprising since the more courses that are transferable to a California State University (CSU) or University of California (UC) school, the more likely that student is to continue and finish their transfer degree.</p>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">
</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<h2 id="XGBoost">XGBoost<a class="anchor-link" href="#XGBoost">¶</a></h2>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">In [125]:</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="input_area">
<div class=" highlight hl-ipython2"><pre><span></span><span class="kn">from</span> <span class="nn">math</span> <span class="kn">import</span> <span class="n">sqrt</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">log</span>
<span class="n">xg_model</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">xgb</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">XGBClassifier</span><span class="p">()</span>
<span class="n">params</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="p">{</span><span class="s1">'n_estimators'</span><span class="p">:</span> <span class="p">[</span><span class="mi">250</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="mi">300</span><span class="p">],</span> <span class="s1">'max_depth'</span><span class="p">:</span> <span class="p">[</span><span class="mi">5</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="mi">7</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="mi">8</span><span class="p">],</span> <span class="s1">'learning_rate'</span><span class="p">:</span> <span class="p">[</span><span class="mf">0.1</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="mf">0.2</span><span class="p">],</span>
          <span class="s1">'subsample'</span><span class="p">:[</span><span class="mf">0.8</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="mi">1</span><span class="p">]}</span>
<span class="n">gs_xgb</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">GridSearchCV</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">xg_model</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">params</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="n">gs_xgb</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">fit</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">X_train</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">Y_train</span><span class="p">)</span>

<span class="n">sample</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">gs_xgb</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">best_params_</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">'subsample'</span><span class="p">]</span>
<span class="n">learning</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">gs_xgb</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">best_params_</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">'learning_rate'</span><span class="p">]</span>
<span class="n">depth</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">gs_xgb</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">best_params_</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">'max_depth'</span><span class="p">]</span>
<span class="n">n</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">gs_xgb</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">best_params_</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">'n_estimators'</span><span class="p">]</span>

<span class="n">xgb_model</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">xgb</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">XGBClassifier</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">learning_rate</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">learning</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">max_depth</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">depth</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">n_estimators</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">n</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">subsample</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">sample</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="n">xgb_model</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">fit</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">X_train</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">Y_train</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">eval_set</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="p">[(</span><span class="n">X_test</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">Y_test</span><span class="p">)],</span> <span class="n">early_stopping_rounds</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="mi">150</span><span class="p">,</span> 
              <span class="n">eval_metric</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="s1">'error'</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">verbose</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="bp">False</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="k">print</span> <span class="s1">'overall accuracy:'</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">xgb_model</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">score</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">X_test</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">Y_test</span><span class="p">)</span>
</pre></div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="output_wrapper">
<div class="output">
<div class="output_area"><div class="prompt"></div>
<div class="output_subarea output_stream output_stdout output_text">
<pre>overall accuracy: 0.748644699005
</pre>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">In [129]:</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="input_area">
<div class=" highlight hl-ipython2"><pre><span></span><span class="n">prob_xgb</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">xgb_model</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">predict_proba</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">X_test</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="n">pred_labels_xgb</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="p">[</span><span class="mi">0</span> <span class="k">if</span> <span class="n">prob_xgb</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="n">i</span><span class="p">][</span><span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">>.</span><span class="mi">30</span> <span class="k">else</span> <span class="mi">1</span> <span class="k">for</span> <span class="n">i</span> <span class="ow">in</span> <span class="nb">range</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="nb">len</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">prob_xgb</span><span class="p">))]</span> 
<span class="n">cm_xgb</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">confusion_matrix</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">Y_test</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">pred_labels_xgb</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="n">plot_confusion</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">cm_xgb</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">classes</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">title</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="s1">'XGBoost Confusion Matrix'</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="n">tnr_xgb</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">cm_xgb</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">]</span><span class="o">/</span><span class="nb">float</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">cm_xgb</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">+</span> <span class="n">cm_xgb</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="mi">1</span><span class="p">])</span>
<span class="k">print</span> <span class="s1">'tnr:'</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">tnr_xgb</span> 
</pre></div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="output_wrapper">
<div class="output">
<div class="output_area"><div class="prompt"></div>
<div class="output_subarea output_stream output_stdout output_text">
<pre>tnr: 0.869309989701
</pre>

<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">
</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<h2 id="Neural-Network---Multilayer-Perceptron">Neural Network - Multilayer Perceptron<a class="anchor-link" href="#Neural-Network---Multilayer-Perceptron">¶</a></h2><p><img alt="title" src="http://docs.opencv.org/2.4/_images/mlp.png" /></p>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">In [124]:</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="input_area">
<div class=" highlight hl-ipython2"><pre><span></span><span class="n">nn_model</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">MLPClassifier</span><span class="p">()</span>
<span class="n">params</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="p">{</span><span class="s1">'hidden_layer_sizes'</span><span class="p">:[(</span><span class="mi">100</span><span class="p">,),</span> <span class="p">(</span><span class="mi">150</span><span class="p">,)],</span><span class="s1">'alpha'</span><span class="p">:[</span><span class="mf">0.0001</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="mf">0.01</span><span class="p">],</span> <span class="s1">'activation'</span><span class="p">:[</span><span class="s1">'tanh'</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s1">'relu'</span><span class="p">],</span>
         <span class="s1">'learning_rate'</span><span class="p">:[</span><span class="s1">'adaptive'</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="s1">'constant'</span><span class="p">],</span> <span class="s1">'max_iter'</span><span class="p">:[</span><span class="mi">500</span><span class="p">]}</span>
<span class="n">gs_nn</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">GridSearchCV</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">nn_model</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">params</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="n">gs_nn</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">fit</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">X_train</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">Y_train</span><span class="p">)</span>

<span class="n">gs_nn</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">best_params_</span>

<span class="n">act</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">gs_nn</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">best_params_</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">'activation'</span><span class="p">]</span>
<span class="n">alph</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">gs_nn</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">best_params_</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">'alpha'</span><span class="p">]</span>
<span class="n">layer</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">gs_nn</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">best_params_</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">'hidden_layer_sizes'</span><span class="p">]</span>
<span class="n">rate</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">gs_nn</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">best_params_</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">'learning_rate'</span><span class="p">]</span>

<span class="n">nn_model</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">MLPClassifier</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">activation</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">act</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">alpha</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">alph</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">hidden_layer_sizes</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">layer</span><span class="p">,</span>
                         <span class="n">learning_rate</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">rate</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">max_iter</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="mi">500</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="n">nn_model</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">fit</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">X_train</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="n">Y_train</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="k">print</span> <span class="s1">'overall accuracy:'</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">nn_model</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">score</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">X_test</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">Y_test</span><span class="p">)</span>
</pre></div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="output_wrapper">
<div class="output">
<div class="output_area"><div class="prompt"></div>
<div class="output_subarea output_stream output_stdout output_text">
<pre>overall accuracy: 0.746004808372
</pre>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">In [119]:</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="input_area">
<div class=" highlight hl-ipython2"><pre><span></span><span class="n">prob_nn</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">nn_model</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">predict_proba</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">X_test</span><span class="p">)</span>

<span class="n">pred_labels_nn</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="p">[</span><span class="mi">0</span> <span class="k">if</span> <span class="n">prob_nn</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="n">i</span><span class="p">][</span><span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">>.</span><span class="mi">30</span> <span class="k">else</span> <span class="mi">1</span> <span class="k">for</span> <span class="n">i</span> <span class="ow">in</span> <span class="nb">range</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="nb">len</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">prob_nn</span><span class="p">))]</span> 

<span class="n">cm_nn</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">confusion_matrix</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">Y_test</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">pred_labels_nn</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="n">plot_confusion</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">cm_nn</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">classes</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">title</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="s1">'Neural Network Confusion Matrix'</span><span class="p">)</span>

<span class="n">tnr_nn</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">cm_nn</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">]</span><span class="o">/</span><span class="nb">float</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">cm_nn</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">+</span> <span class="n">cm_nn</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="mi">1</span><span class="p">])</span>
<span class="k">print</span> <span class="s1">'tnr:'</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">tnr_nn</span> 
</pre></div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="output_wrapper">
<div class="output">
<div class="output_area"><div class="prompt"></div>
<div class="output_subarea output_stream output_stdout output_text">
<pre>tnr: 0.888877445932
</pre>
</div>

<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">
</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<h3 id="Majority-Vote-Ensemble">Majority Vote Ensemble<a class="anchor-link" href="#Majority-Vote-Ensemble">¶</a></h3><ul>
<li>Results from a set of models are combined to vote on the result.</li>
</ul>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">In [128]:</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="input_area">
<div class=" highlight hl-ipython2"><pre><span></span><span class="n">mv_model</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">VotingClassifier</span><span class="p">([(</span><span class="s1">'xgb'</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="n">xgb_model</span><span class="p">),</span> <span class="p">(</span><span class="s1">'nn'</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">nn_model</span><span class="p">),</span> <span class="p">(</span><span class="s1">'lasso'</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="n">best_lasso</span><span class="p">)],</span> <span class="n">voting</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="s1">'soft'</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="n">mv_model</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">fit</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">X_train</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">Y_train</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="k">print</span> <span class="s1">'overall accuracy:'</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">mv_model</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">score</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">X_test</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">Y_test</span><span class="p">)</span>
</pre></div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="output_wrapper">
<div class="output">
<div class="output_area"><div class="prompt"></div>
<div class="output_subarea output_stream output_stdout output_text">
<pre>overall accuracy: 0.74892754443
</pre>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">In [133]:</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="input_area">
<div class=" highlight hl-ipython2"><pre><span></span><span class="n">prob_mv</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">mv_model</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">predict_proba</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">X_test</span><span class="p">)</span>

<span class="n">pred_labels_mv</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="p">[</span><span class="mi">0</span> <span class="k">if</span> <span class="n">prob_mv</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="n">i</span><span class="p">][</span><span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">>.</span><span class="mi">30</span> <span class="k">else</span> <span class="mi">1</span> <span class="k">for</span> <span class="n">i</span> <span class="ow">in</span> <span class="nb">range</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="nb">len</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">prob_mv</span><span class="p">))]</span> 

<span class="n">cm_mv</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">confusion_matrix</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">Y_test</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">pred_labels_mv</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="n">plot_confusion</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">cm_mv</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">classes</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">title</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="s1">'Majority Vote Confusion Matrix'</span><span class="p">)</span>

<span class="n">tnr_mv</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">cm_mv</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">]</span><span class="o">/</span><span class="nb">float</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">cm_mv</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">+</span> <span class="n">cm_mv</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="mi">1</span><span class="p">])</span>
<span class="k">print</span> <span class="s1">'tnr:'</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">tnr_mv</span> 
</pre></div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="output_wrapper">
<div class="output">
<div class="output_area"><div class="prompt"></div>
<div class="output_subarea output_stream output_stdout output_text">
<pre>tnr: 0.865808444902
</pre>
</div>
</div>

<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">
</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<h2 id="Comparing-Results">Comparing Results<a class="anchor-link" href="#Comparing-Results">¶</a></h2>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">In [134]:</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="input_area">
<div class=" highlight hl-ipython2"><pre><span></span><span class="n">cmatrix</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="p">[</span><span class="n">cm_in</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">cm_lasso</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">cm_gb</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">cm_xgb</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">cm_nn</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">cm_mv</span><span class="p">]</span>
<span class="n">models</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">'Probation'</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="s1">'Lasso'</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="s1">'Gradient Boosting'</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s1">'XGBoost'</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="s1">'Neural Network'</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s1">'Majority Vote'</span><span class="p">]</span>
<span class="n">classes</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">'Not Returning'</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s1">'Returning'</span><span class="p">]</span>
<span class="n">tnr_values</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="p">[</span><span class="n">tnr_pj</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">tnr_lasso</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">tnr_gb</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">tnr_xgb</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">tnr_nn</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">tnr_mv</span><span class="p">]</span>

<span class="k">def</span> <span class="nf">plot_all_confusion</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">cms</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">classes</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">titles</span><span class="p">):</span>
    <span class="n">fig</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">plt</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">figure</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">figsize</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="p">(</span><span class="mi">16</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="mi">10</span><span class="p">))</span>
    <span class="k">for</span> <span class="n">i</span> <span class="ow">in</span> <span class="nb">range</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="mi">1</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="nb">len</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">cmatrix</span><span class="p">)</span> <span class="o">+</span> <span class="mi">1</span><span class="p">):</span>
        <span class="n">j</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">i</span> <span class="o">-</span> <span class="mi">1</span>
        <span class="n">cm</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">cms</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="n">j</span><span class="p">]</span>
        <span class="n">ax1</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">fig</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">add_subplot</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="mi">2</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="mi">3</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="n">i</span><span class="p">)</span>
        <span class="n">sns</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">heatmap</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">cm</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">annot</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="bp">True</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">fmt</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="s1">'d'</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">annot_kws</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="p">{</span><span class="s2">"size"</span><span class="p">:</span> <span class="mi">20</span><span class="p">},</span> <span class="n">ax</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">ax1</span><span class="p">,</span> 
                   <span class="n">xticklabels</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">'Not Returning'</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s1">'Returning'</span><span class="p">],</span> 
                   <span class="n">yticklabels</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">'Not Returning'</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s1">'Returning'</span><span class="p">],</span>
                   <span class="n">cbar</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">,</span> 
                   <span class="n">cmap</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="s2">"Blues"</span><span class="p">)</span>
        <span class="n">plt</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">xticks</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">rotation</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">fontsize</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="mi">14</span><span class="p">)</span>
        <span class="n">plt</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">yticks</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">rotation</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="mi">90</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">fontsize</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="mi">14</span><span class="p">)</span>
        <span class="n">plt</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">title</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">titles</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="n">j</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">+</span> <span class="s1">' tnr: '</span> <span class="o">+</span> <span class="nb">str</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">tnr_values</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="n">j</span><span class="p">])</span> <span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">fontsize</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="mi">20</span><span class="p">)</span>
        <span class="n">plt</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">tight_layout</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">h_pad</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="mf">5.0</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">w_pad</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="mf">3.0</span><span class="p">)</span>
        <span class="n">plt</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">xlabel</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s1">'Predicted Labels'</span><span class="p">)</span>
        <span class="n">plt</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">ylabel</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s1">'True Labels'</span><span class="p">)</span>
</pre></div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">In [135]:</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="input_area">
<div class=" highlight hl-ipython2"><pre><span></span><span class="n">plot_all_confusion</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">cmatrix</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">classes</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">models</span><span class="p">)</span>
</pre></div>
</div>
</div>
</div>

<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">
</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<h3 id="Remarks">Remarks<a class="anchor-link" href="#Remarks">¶</a></h3><p>This analysis was not done for consecutive semesters. Instead, I was interested in whether a student would return for a 3rd semester no matter how large the gap is between their 1st semester and 3rd semester. Even just looking into a few students who earned their degrees, several of them have taken a year to a year and a half off from school and return to finish their degree. This is not uncommon at a community college.</p>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">
</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<h2 id="Improvements">Improvements<a class="anchor-link" href="#Improvements">¶</a></h2><p>More features outside of this dataset should give improvement to the results.</p>
<p>Knowing a students' age would help, especially for a community college because the range in age is greater than at a university. Many older adults return or enroll at community colleges.</p>
<p>Any geographic features regarding where students' reside would also improve results. From geographic data, more features can be engineered such as how far a student has to commute to school.</p>
<p>Job status would be an important feature. Having data on whether a student is working (part time vs full time) or is not working should drive improvements.</p>
<p>Finally, high school data such as standardized test scores, high school gpa, high school attended, and extracurricular activities participated in would defintely be important, especially when using the first semester data to predict retention.</p>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">
</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<h3 id="Conclusion">Conclusion<a class="anchor-link" href="#Conclusion">¶</a></h3><ul>
<li>All of the machine learning models are an improvement compared to the current probation models<ul>
<li>The more appropriate model can be chosen depending on the amount of resources the school has<ul>
<li>The Neural Network provides the best true negative rate</li>
</ul>
</li>
</ul>
</li>
<li>Application:<ul>
<li>Gain insights on students' risk status to intervene early, improving retention and persistence.</li>
<li>Stronger basis on which students to allocate limited resources</li>
<li>With a few modifications, this analysis can be used for any combination of semesters.</li>
</ul>
</li>
</ul>
</div>
</div>
</div>

    var mathjaxscript = document.createElement('script');
    mathjaxscript.id = 'mathjaxscript_pelican_#%@#$@#';
    mathjaxscript.type = 'text/javascript';
    mathjaxscript.src = '//cdn.mathjax.org/mathjax/latest/MathJax.js?config=TeX-AMS-MML_HTMLorMML';
    mathjaxscript[(window.opera ? "innerHTML" : "text")] =
        "MathJax.Hub.Config({" +
        "    config: ['MMLorHTML.js']," +
        "    TeX: { extensions: ['AMSmath.js','AMSsymbols.js','noErrors.js','noUndefined.js'], equationNumbers: { autoNumber: 'AMS' } }," +
        "    jax: ['input/TeX','input/MathML','output/HTML-CSS']," +
        "    extensions: ['tex2jax.js','mml2jax.js','MathMenu.js','MathZoom.js']," +
        "    displayAlign: 'center'," +
        "    displayIndent: '0em'," +
        "    showMathMenu: true," +
        "    tex2jax: { " +
        "        inlineMath: [ ['$','$'] ], " +
        "        displayMath: [ ['$$','$$'] ]," +
        "        processEscapes: true," +
        "        preview: 'TeX'," +
        "    }, " +
        "    'HTML-CSS': { " +
        "        styles: { '.MathJax_Display, .MathJax .mo, .MathJax .mi, .MathJax .mn': {color: 'black ! important'} }" +
        "    } " +
        "}); ";
    (document.body || document.getElementsByTagName('head')[0]).appendChild(mathjaxscript);
}
</script>
